comment._content: Maximilian Harden, aka Felix Ernst Witkowski (1861-1927), German journalist, editor: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maximilian_Harden

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Harden's book, "Monarchs and Men," which contains his observations on the ways of the mighty, was newly published in 1913. The photo is dated July 24, 1913.
